title: Update production subdomain from josh-ulx to josh

requirements.text: Update the app’s production deployment configuration so the app is served at subdomain `josh.caffeine.xyz` instead of `josh-ulx.caffeine.xyz`.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting https://josh.caffeine.xyz loads the app successfully in production.
The production deployment no longer uses the `josh-ulx` subdomain as the primary/canonical app URL.

requirements.text: Ensure existing links to `https://josh-ulx.caffeine.xyz` continue to work by configuring a redirect (or equivalent) from `josh-ulx.caffeine.xyz` to `josh.caffeine.xyz`, preserving the full path and query/hash route.
acceptanceCriteria: Requests to https://josh-ulx.caffeine.xyz/* redirect (or otherwise resolve) to https://josh.caffeine.xyz/* while preserving the route (including hash-based routes).
After redirection, Internet Identity sign-in and authenticated actions (posting/liking/following/replying/reposting) still function as before.

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Do not introduce additional backend services; keep the single-actor Motoko backend architecture unchanged.
nonGoals: Changing the app’s name/branding beyond the subdomain change.
Implementing custom DNS outside the caffeine.xyz domain.
